account_deactive: Your current account is in the process of being deleted.

console_bind_manual_btn_tips: Unregistered email addresses will be automatically registered after verification.

console_bind_success_subtitle_tips: You can log in to HoYoverse on PC/iOS/Android using your account.

console_reactivate_warning_label_os: Your account will be permanently deleted in 30 days from the day you submit your request.
console_user_protocal_local_first_conten: Please read the Terms of Service and Privacy Policy carefully and click "Agree" to use this product. console_user_protocal_update_content: Terms of Service and/or Privacy Policy have been updated. Please read the provisions carefully and click "Agree" before continuing using this product. console_welcome_bind_existing: Already have an account, log in directly
console_welcome_bind_new_desc_os: By continuing, a new HoYoverse account will be created. Your previous game data on other devices will not be synced.
console_welcome_bind_new_desc_os_with_ga: By continuing, a new HoYoverse account will be created. Your previous game data on other devices will not be synced.
console_welcome_content_os: If you hope to log in to this account on other platforms or share your in-game data between accounts on other platforms, please link a HoYoverse Account.
cx_bind_subtitle_os: Link your HoYoverse Account with your third-party account to sync game progress.
cx_bind_subtitle_os_with_gamertag: Link your HoYoverse account with your Microsoft account (%s) to sync game progress.
cx_user_protocal_content: In order to optimize your gaming experience, we will now securely link your third-party account to our servers. You may cancel this link and delete your account data at any time via the official website or by contacting Customer Service.
delete_account_confirm_notice: Please confirm that you want to clear login records. You will need to log back into this account the next time you use this device.
delete_account_notice: Delete account login records? (Does not delete account data)
determine_reactivate_account_or_not: Would you like to reactivate it?

fatigue_reminder_tip: %s, you have been playing the game for %s hours. Please take a break.
geetest_failed: Verification code failed, please try again
google_auth_failed_desc: Login request failed. Please try again or try another login method.
google_auth_timeout_desc: The server connection request timed out. The web server may be temporarily unavailable or busy. Please try again or try another login method.
google_auth_wait_desc: Please log in on your browser
google_pc_http_server_error: Authorization failed, please try again (Request error)
google_pc_oauth_back_tips: Before you can enter the game, you must log in to Google Play and obtain authorization. Are you sure you want to exit?

google_pc_pay_no_order_find: Payment details cannot be accessed at this time. If your payment was successful, you will be able to access the shipping status shortly.
google_pc_permission_miss: Google Play authorization incomplete. please click "Return to Google Play" to log in and enable all permissions.
google_pc_user_no_action: Please log in to Google Play and obtain authorization
google_pc_web_operation_message: You have opened Google Play in your browser. If authorization is successful, please click "Authorized."
google_pc_web_operation_title: Please log in on your browser

oversea_guardian: 접속하신 아이디는 만 14세 미만 법정대리인 동의가 필요한 아이디로써 관련 규정에 따라 법정대리인의 동의가 필요합니다. \n관련 정보를 입력하고 인증해 주세요

psn_account_info_other_region_tip: If you have game progress on other servers, this linking will not able to synchronize the game progress of other servers to your account of PlayStation™Network
psn_bind_manual_agree: Please read and agree to the agreements
psn_bind_manual_btn_tips: If your email is not yet registered, it will be registered automatically after successful verification.
psn_bind_manual_btn_tips_cn: If your mobile number is not yet registered, it will be registered automatically after successful verification.

psn_bind_qr_msg_os: Scan the QR Code with a camera app on your phone
psn_bind_subtitle_cn: Your miHoYo account will be linked with your account of PlayStation™Network to sync game progress.
psn_bind_subtitle_os: Link your HoYoverse account with your account of PlayStation™Network to sync game progress.

psn_welcome_content_os: A HoYoverse account is needed to share your game progress across multiple devices
qrcode_login_failed_tips: Please check your network connection or refresh and try again.
qrcode_login_scan_success_tips: Please tap "Confirm login" on your phone.
qrcode_overdue_tips: QR code expired. Click to refresh.
reactivate_accoun_notice_cn:
Your account is currently in the "deletion confirmation period."

Do you want to reactivate your account and log in?
Please note that the deletion process will be canceled after reactivation.
※The deletion confirmation period is 3 days from the date on which you request the deletion.
reactivate_accoun_notice_os:
Your account is currently in the "deletion confirmation period."\n
Do you want to reactivate your account and log in?\n
Please note that the deletion process will be canceled after reactivation.\n
※The deletion confirmation period is 30 days from the date on which you request the deletion.
read_user_agreement_first: Please read and agree to the Terms of Service
real_people_agree: I have read and agree to the %s, %s, and %s
real_people_anti_addiction_pc_tip: You will be subject to the Play Time Limit. You can remove the restrictions the next time you log in with facial recognition on your mobile device.

real_people_anti_addiction_tip: You will be subject to the Play Time Limit. You can remove the restrictions the next time you log in with facial recognition.
real_people_back_tip: You will not be able to log into the game if you confirm to return. Please continue the verification.
real_people_message: To ensure the validity of real-name verification, please complete facial recognition verification before entering the game. Otherwise, your game time may be limited.
real_people_pc_tip: Facial recognition is currently not supported on the PC. Please log in on a mobile device to complete verification.
real_people_real_name_info_tip: Real name information of current account
real_people_request_camera_tip: Access to your camera permissions is required in order to use the facial recognition verification function.
real_people_setting_camera_tip: Please enable camera permissions in Settings > Apps in order to use the facial recognition verification function.
real_people_wait_search_result: Please wait for the verification results.
realname_close_notice: To finish account registration, you must complete real-name verification. Otherwise, you will be returned to the %s screen.
realname_empty: Please enter your ID Card number
realname_failed: Real-name verification failed. Please try again.
realname_notice: In accordance with the "Notice on Preventing Online Video Gaming Addiction in Minors," players must provide valid identity information to complete real-name verification.
realname_notice_content: In accordance with the "Notice on Preventing Online Video Gaming Addiction in Minors" and "Notice on Further Strictly Regulating and Effectively Preventing Online Video Gaming Addiction in Minors" of the National Press and Publication Administration, please provide real and valid identity information to complete real-name verification.
realname_pay_close_notice: Real-name verification must be completed before payment can be made. Are you sure you want to cancel?
role_selector_no_data: Unable to find any character on the current server.
save_record_tips: Login info will be saved. Please ensure that this device is trustworthy.
second_real_name_hint: Your account is at risk, please enter your valid identifiable information
second_real_name_verify_hint: In order to protect your information security, please complete security verification first.
send_mail_success: A verification code has been sent to your email address (%s). Please check your email.
sign_out_clear_data_tips: Select this option if you are no longer using this device.
sign_out_clear_data_tips_content: You will need to log in with this account again the next time you use this device
sign_out_save_data_tips: Your login information will be saved once you select this option. To ensure data security, please make sure to use a device you trust.
sign_out_save_data_tips_content: You will be able to log in with this account automatically the next time you use this device. Please ensure that your device is trustworthy.
status_code_429: Network busy. Please try again later.
status_code_4xx: Network busy. Please try again later.
status_code_5xx: Server busy. Please try again later.

suggest_verify_phone:

tips_bind_account: Please link at least one account as soon as possible to protect your data and to avoid losing it.
